about_the_game:
This is an action-packed tank shooter with a 2D top-down view, fresh half-pixel half-cartoon graphics, horizontal/vertical adventure mode, and defeating the boss of each level to pass the level.

The game has a fast fighting rhythm.

The game is set in a completely empty historical background, and tells the story of two virtual formations, Red and Blue, who fight against each other. At the beginning of the game, Red attacks the entire continent, with armored troops patrolling around, and Blue sends a fleet to land for the battle, and the game begins.

The first version of the game contains a player character, a medium-sized tank of the blue side, characterized by high life value, high defense, fast movement speed, fast firing speed, in subsequent versions of the update will be added to the new types of player characters.

The game contains a variety of enemies:

1. defense guns that can shoot quickly;

2. light tanks that fire tracking missiles, characterized by exceptionally fast movement speeds, players wanting to defeat it can block its path with the body;

3. Medium tanks with strong defense, with high life value, high defense and quick reaction, they are the player's strongest enemy;

4. Jagdpanther that can release lightning, the lightning can paralyze the player and make him temporarily incapacitated.

Among these enemies, there are some very powerful individuals who have been fighting for years and have earned their own unique titles to defeat them!

Guys you have to remember that all enemies have to walk in circles around them and in large outer circles, never stop to take a beating or your character will die soon.

New types of enemies will be added in subsequent version updates, so get on the wish list!

name: Tank Battle Salvo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is an action tank shooting game. It uses a 2D overwhelming perspective, a fresh half -pixel half -cartoon picture, and the horizontal/vertical adventure mode.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal
